blank.description: Opens the URL address using [_blank] property (under new tab or window).

url.description: The URL address to navigate to.

user.description: The URL address to navigate to.

description: Load a new web page in the current browser window. This is done using an HTTP GET operation and the method will block until the load is complete. this action supports locators, elements, attributes, macros and regular expressions.

examples.description: Navigate to [https://www.google.com] using [_blank] operation (new tab or window).
Navigate to [https://www.google.com] and apply credentials into alert (if exists).
Gets the text content of the element found by the given locator and pass it as URL to the current browser.
examples.literalExample: go to url take {//li[5]/a} inner text

examples.description: Gets the text content of the element found by the given locator and pass it as URL to a new browser tab or window.
examples.literalExample: go to url {{$ --blank}} take {//li[5]/a} inner text

examples.description: Gets the [href] value of the element found by the given locator and pass it as URL to the current browser.
examples.literalExample: go to url take {//li[5]/a} element from {href} attribute

examples.description: Gets the first match from the element [href] attribute found by the given locator, filtered by the given pattern and pass it as URL to the current browser.
examples.literalExample: go to url take {//li[5]/a} element from {href} filter {https://gravitymvctestapplication.azurewebsites.net}

name: GoToUrl

properties.elementToActOn: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.elementAttributeToActOn: The element attribute from which to extract information for action execution. If not specified, information will be taken from the element inner text.
properties.regularExpression: A pattern by which the extracted information will be evaluated. Returns the first match.
properties.argument: The URL to load. It is best to use a fully qualified URL.

summary: Load a new web page in the current browser window.
